name: LambdaNETCoreDeploy
description: Build and deploy a Serverless .NET Core application or AWS Lambda function
author: Amazon Web Services
helpMarkDown: Please refer to [AWS Lambda Developer Guide](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/) for more information on working with AWS Lambda.

inputs.name: awsCredentials
inputs.label: AWS Credentials
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the AWS credentials to use. If needed, click on 'Manage', and add a new Service Endpoint of type 'AWS'.

inputs.name: lambdaProjectPath
inputs.label: Path to Lambda Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: The relative path to the location of the Lambda project to deploy.

inputs.name: command
inputs.label: Deployment Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of deployment to perform. "Function" deploys a single function to AWS Lambda. "Serverless application" performs a deployment using AWS CloudFormation, allowing multiple function deployment.

inputs.name: functionName
inputs.label: Function Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name for the deployed Lambda function.

inputs.name: functionRole
inputs.label: Function Role
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the AWS Identity and Access Management Role that provides access to AWS services to the deployed Lambda function.

inputs.name: functionHandler
inputs.label: Function Handler
inputs.helpMarkDown: The function within your code that Lambda calls to begin execution. Format is <assembly-name>::<type-name>::<function-name>.

inputs.name: functionMemory
inputs.label: Function Memory (MB)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Memory allocated to the Lambda function. The value must be in multiples of 64.

inputs.name: functionTimeout
inputs.label: Function Timout (Seconds)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The function execution time at which Lambda should terminate the function.

inputs.name: stackName
inputs.label: Stack Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the AWS CloudFormation stack.

inputs.name: s3Bucket
inputs.label: S3 Bucket
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the S3 bucket used to store the built project.

inputs.name: s3Prefix
inputs.label: S3 Prefix
inputs.helpMarkDown: The object key prefix to be used for the deployment objects that will be uploaded to S3.

inputs.name: additionalArgs
inputs.label: Additional Lambda Tools Command Line Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional arguments when executing the 'dotnet lambda' command.

messages.ClearingProfileCredentials: Clearing out profile %s so task credentials will be used.
